name: Amalgamate!Tale-CHAPETER 1
description:
Install instructions

When file is dawloanded, you can go to the site:https://scratch.mit.edu/

when you are in the site you click in "create", now click in "upload from computer", it's open a file page, now click the file of the game, the game is open, now click in enlarge screen symbol, click in the green flag, and the game is started!

if you have problem, you can write a comment, and we can resolve your problem!
